Issue 21 of LaTeX2e news released

Oct 16, 2014

Issue 21 of LaTeX2e news released

For some reason we forgot to add issue number 21 to the web site. It has now been added to [LaTeX2e news page]((/news/latex2e-news/) and documents the changes that have been made to the LaTeX2e release in 2014.
